name: LockSpace
description:
Use your alien powers of extrusion and teleportation as you explore and escape from The Enigma, an abandoned space station with a secret to hide.

LockSpace is a student capstone project and a proof of concept being developed for the HTC Vive by a team of 6 students studying various branches of Information Technology at Deakin University. There is currently no guarantee that the project will receive further development.
